title: 5 BANS
body: It is only fair that when banning champions all five summoners of each team have the chance to ban, there being so many champs now.

replies.body: if they give 5 bans, lcs would be boring, with them not allowed to play their mains
It would eliminate mains, exactly, making it more diverse and interesting, more combinations, more possibilities of play.

If someone gets tilted by just seeing a champ that is their problem. You ban based on your team comp and what is currently broken make decisions and like someone already said in LCS one team would just ban all of their opponents mains.

Yeah out of 150+ champions there are a lot more then 6 champions total that are really stupid to play against and even if they are not some champions make people lilt just by playing with them (VI,Fizz,new vlad,new veigar,teemo,ekko,renekton,mundo,olaf,nocturn,darius,arhi, and katerina). we should atleast be given more bans so we can have a good game and not be salty
